column2: We're almost there! One more level! Ready to find the second access fob?
We need to beat the final level in Lightspeed. Launch it now.

Here we are. You'll have to create and beat the final level with every monster and every upgrade.

Press the Flip button to go to the code.

All right, now we need to give it everything. Let's spawn every enemy and powerup in this level.

Click on the Spawn tab and look at the `spawnEnemy()` function.

Let's change it so it spawns any of the 4 enemies: *asteroid*, *spinner*, *squid*, or *beam*.
Remember the `pickOne()` function? It can be useful here too.
Use the `pickOne()` function to return one of the 4 enemies, `'asteroid'`, `'spinner'`, `'squid'` or `'beam'`.
You should get all 4 enemies in this level.
I don't see all 4 enemies. Let's go back and check.
Yes, you got all 4 enemies. Now keep playing to the end. That's how we'll get the code.
Well done! I knew you could it. And here's the code, as we expected.
Excellent. As soon as we get all three codes we'll activate the three panels.
Go if you must, but I do hope you'll check back later.
